pkgmetadata.longdescription: A fast, unbiased and exact allelic exact test // This is the implementation in R+C of a new association test described in "A fast, unbiased and exact allelic exact test for case-control association studies" (Submitted). It appears that in most cases the classical chi-square test used for testing for allelic association on genotype data is biased. Our test is unbiased, exact but fast throught careful optimization.
